title: Add admin portal login with hardcoded credentials and remember me option

requirements.text: Create a standalone admin portal login page (separate from Internet Identity) that authenticates using hardcoded credentials: username 'baslxr' and password 'bas12345'. The login page should be accessible at a dedicated route (e.g., /admin-login) and redirect to the admin dashboard upon successful authentication.

quotes: admit portal login username is baslxr. And password is bas12345

acceptanceCriteria: A login page exists with username and password input fields
Entering username 'baslxr' and password 'bas12345' grants access to the admin area
Entering incorrect credentials shows an error message
Successful login redirects the user to the admin dashboard

requirements.text: Add a 'Remember Me' checkbox on the admin login page. When checked and the user logs in successfully, the username and password are persisted in localStorage so that the fields are pre-filled on the next visit. When unchecked, no credentials are saved and any previously saved credentials are cleared from localStorage.

quotes: remember or save username and password option

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Remember Me' checkbox is displayed on the login page
When 'Remember Me' is checked and login is successful, username and password are saved to localStorage
On subsequent visits, the username and password fields are pre-filled from localStorage if saved credentials exist
The 'Remember Me' checkbox is also pre-checked if saved credentials exist
When 'Remember Me' is unchecked on login, any previously saved credentials are removed from localStorage

requirements.text: Protect all existing admin routes so that unauthenticated users (those who have not logged in via the admin login page) are redirected to the admin login page. Store the authenticated session state in sessionStorage (or a React context) so that refreshing the page within the same session keeps the user logged in, but closing the browser clears the session (unless Remember Me credentials are saved).

quotes: admit portal login username is baslxr. And password is bas12345

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating directly to any admin route without being logged in redirects to the admin login page
After login, navigating to admin routes works without re-authentication within the same session
A logout button in the admin layout clears the session and redirects to the login page

constraints: Do not remove or break the existing Internet Identity integration in useInternetIdentity.ts
Hardcoded credentials (baslxr / bas12345) must be used exactly as provided
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Backend credential storage or API-based authentication
Password hashing or encryption (credentials are hardcoded on the frontend)
Changing the existing Internet Identity login flow
